CustomField.description: Created for GTMS-13490 : to use in opportunity Partner Referral Amount field
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Partner_Tier__c,'Silver'),0.20, IF(ISPICKVAL( Partner_Tier__c,'Gold'),0.20, IF(ISPICKVAL( Partner_Tier__c,'Platinum'),0.20,0.20)))
CustomField.label: Referral Rebate
